items.todoItem: Choose a good name rather than great riches.
Train up a child in the way they should go and when they are old they will not depart from it.
Know that the borrower is servant to the lender.
Be liberal in bestowing gifts and favours and be blessed.
Bless the poor and be blessed.
Cast out the scorner and contention and contempt will cease.
Know that foolishness is bound in the heart of a child but the rod of correction shall drive it far from them.
Listen carefully and hear the words of the wise.
